god-has-heard.context: The angel names Ishmael before his birth
god-has-heard.hebrew: וְקָרָאת שְׁמוֹ יִשְׁמָעֵאל כִּי־שָׁמַע יְהוָה אֶל־עָנְיֵךְ
god-has-heard.english: You shall call his name Ishmael, for the LORD has heard your affliction

wild-donkey-of-man.context: The angel's prophecy about Ishmael's nature
wild-donkey-of-man.hebrew: וְהוּא יִהְיֶה פֶּרֶא אָדָם יָדוֹ בַכֹּל וְיַד כֹּל בּוֹ
wild-donkey-of-man.english: He shall be a wild donkey of a man; his hand against everyone and everyone's hand against him

dwelling-among-brothers.english: He shall dwell over against all his kinsmen

god-heard-the-boy.context: God saves Ishmael in the wilderness
god-heard-the-boy.english: God heard the voice of the boy

great-nation.context: God's promise to Hagar about Ishmael
great-nation.english: For I will make him a great nation

twelve-princes.english: Twelve princes according to their nations

buried-abraham.context: Isaac and Ishmael reunite to bury their father
buried-abraham.english: His sons Isaac and Ishmael buried him
